Project information

  • Category: robotics,construction,sensors
  • Team: abeer_art9

Construction and plastering robot

The robot aims to raise productivity and quality while reducing costs and reducing risks to the human element. It gives accurate mixing ratios so as not to affect the long term construction. The arm is flexible and can rotate 360 degrees.
